name: Rescue the Villagers
description: Save the villagers trapped in the forest by the bandits.

name: Slay the Dragon
description: Defeat the dragon terrorizing the northern mountains.

name: Gather Herbs
description: Collect 10 medicinal herbs for the village healer.

name: Deliver the Package
description: Take the sealed package to the merchant in the next town.

name: Solve the Riddle
description: Answer the sphinx's riddle to gain access to the ancient temple.
